title: Suee and the Shadow, Part 1
description: Suee, who never did have many friends to begin with (by choice, she insists) suddenly has to contend with a most unexpected companion: her shadow, who talks too much and has a mind of its own. Sueeâ€™s troubles began when she passed out in the school exhibit room on her first day after hearing a strange voice speaking to her from the darkness.
author: Ginger Ly
